teams.name: Kiva on Wheels
teams.loan_because: Whether hauling people or products, wheels make profit possible.  With transportation loans, Kiva entrepreneurs are on the move - from rickshaws to heavy trucks, motorbikes, taxis, buses, vans and tractors.
teams.description: We support all manner of transport as well as the support team: parts suppliers, body and tire shops, gas stations.  We are drivers!
